data.message: I visited this lovely country in 2001 and know that the positive spirits of the people there will help to rebuild it. Thanks for sharing this story of hope.

replies.message: Thanks for sharing your story, Lynda. We're happy to have people like you in our community! -Rey

No matter how much they come to realize that most of us men are harmless, and would actually love them, they'll always subconsciously have a fight or flight attitude towards men, because we are physically stronger than they are. Women will bicker and complain about their 1st world problems, pointing their finger and hatred at men, until bigger problems show up, then they'll be running to men for support and protection. 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ci7zo_TKbc8
thanks for visiting our small country.. visit again..
